original: Magnusson, Karl Henry, civilingenjör, Mölndal, f. 20/5/00 i Jönköp. av byggmäst. Johan M. o. Frida Svensson. G. 27 m. Lizzie Linderholm. Barn: Karl-Gunnar f. 28, Britta 37. — Utex. fr. CTH (K) 23. AnsL v. Jordbro tändstidksfabr. i Jönköp. 25, driftschef v. Sv. Oljeslageri A-B i Sthlm 26-32, i Mölndal 32-39, forskn ichef där 40-43, därefter fabr :chef. Spec :lär. i kem. apparatteknik v. CTH sed. 46. Resor t. olika europ. länder 28-41. Skr.: Linoljans framställn. o. förädling (i Tekn. samfundets i Gbg minnesskr. 39), Filtrering (i Ing :handboken, Nord. Rotogravyr 47).
translated: Magnusson, Karl Henry, civil engineer, Mölndal, b. 20/5/00 in Jönköping, son of builder Johan M. and Frida Svensson. Married in 1927 to Lizzie Linderholm. Children: Karl-Gunnar, b. 1928, Britta, b. 1937. Graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology in 1923. Employed at Jordbro Ignition Factory in Jönköping in 1925, then as a plant manager at Swedish Oil Factory AB in Stockholm from 1926-1932, in Mölndal from 1932-1939, research director there from 1940-1943, and thereafter factory manager. Special teacher in chemical apparatus technology at the Royal Institute of Technology since 1946. Traveled to various European countries from 1928-1941. Writings: "Production and refining of linseed oil" (in the Technical Society of Gothenburg's memorial publication in 1939), "Filtration" (in the Engineering Handbook, Nordic Rotogravure 1947).

works.name: Production and refining of linseed oil

publishedIn.name: Technical Society of Gothenburg's memorial publication
